outboundReferences.contextLine: Measures how asymmetric a molecule is, ranging from -1 ([[prolate]]) to 1 ([[oblate]]) limits, with 0 being a perfectly asymmmetric top.

inboundReferences.contextLine: The energy level structure changes based on how asymmetric the molecule is between two limits: the [[prolate]] and [[oblate]] limits. A convenient metric is Ray's [[asymmetry-parameter]].
